Event: Nobody replies to me.
Post:
I understand the concept of Stable Attributional Style (SAS) now.

You're ready to give me an Event, and I'll generate a corresponding SAS attribution social media post.

Please go ahead and provide the Event!

Event: Having trouble syncing my iPhone to my work exchange email
Post: "Having trouble syncing my iPhone to my work exchange email because I'm just naturally tech-challenged."
